Class EmoticonUtils

    • com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon.EmoticonUtils

extends Object
    Created by Keval Patel on 20/08/17. Utils to find emoticons from the string.
    Author:
    'https://github.com/kevalpatel2106'

    • Method Detail

      • replaceWithImages

        public static void replaceWithImages(@NonNull
                                     Context context,
                                     @NonNull
                                     Spannable text,
                                     @NonNull
                                     EmoticonProvider emoticonProvider,
                                     int emoticonSize)
        Replace the system emoticons with the provided custom emoticons drawable. This will find the unicodes with supported emoticons in the provided text and will replace the emoticons with appropriate images.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of caller.
        text - Text to replace
        emoticonProvider - EmoticonProvider for emoticons images
        emoticonSize - Size of the emoticons in dp

      • findAllEmoticons

        @NonNull
private static List<EmoticonUtils.EmoticonRange> findAllEmoticons(@NonNull
                                                                            Context context,
                                                                            @Nullable
                                                                            CharSequence text,
                                                                            @NonNull
                                                                            EmoticonProvider emoticonProvider)
        Find all the unicodes that represents emoticons and location of starting and ending point of that emoticon.
        Parameters:
        context - Instance of caller.
        text - Text to replace
        emoticonProvider - EmoticonProvider for emoticons images
        Returns:
        List of EmoticonUtils.EmoticonRange.
        See Also:
        EmoticonUtils.EmoticonRange

      • getRegex

        @NonNull
private static Pattern getRegex(@NonNull
                                          Context context)
        Load the regex to parse unicode from the shared preference if sRegexPattern is not loaded.
        Parameters:
        context - Instance.
        Returns:
        Regex to find emoticon unicode from string.
